Name: Offering table
Description: A limestone offering table. At one end are two small, square hollows for fluids and around the edges is a channel with a spout at the front. In the centre is a small scene depicting offerings of food and drink. At each side is a vase, with what appears to be a plant or vine wrapped about it and a libation pouring from the spout. Between them is an offering table with loaves and cakes and a lotus flower above.
